entry.title: Purify Clarifying Cleanser
entry.description:
Purify Clarifying Cleanser is an energizing, foaming gel specially formulated to remove impurities-like makeup and excess oil-and help reduce the appearance of pores. Natural vitamins and antioxidants help improve texture in order to create skin that is softer and smoother-looking than ever.
Salicylic Acid naturally clarifies and exfoliates to reveal a more balanced complexion. Peppermint Oil and Rosemary Leaf Extract condition skin.

entry.title: ExfoliKate Gentle Exfoliating Treatment
entry.description:
Uncover a vibrant, glowing complexion. ExfoliKate® Gentle Exfoliating Treatment helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles right away, while calming and soothing skin. In fact, in a Clinical test, participants experienced dramatic results after just 1 use. It’s so effective that it won Allure magazine’s coveted “Best of Beauty” award!
Microbeads and Natural Papaya, Pineapple, and Pumpkin Enzymes remove dead surface cells without over-drying. Vitamin A is intended to fade the appearance of discoloration. Natural Extracts-including Lemon, Orange, Sage, and Sweet Almond-are combined to improve skin tone. Hydrating Vitamin E and Aloe Vera are designed to act together to soothe and smooth skin. Geranium and Lemon Balm Extracts serve as natural astringents. Lactic Acid acts as a natural skin exfoliator. Caffeine boosts micro-circulation, while Sage Extract revives the look of skin. Honey, a natural humectant, keeps skin moisturized.

entry.title: ExfoliKate Acne Clearing Exfoliating Treatment
entry.description:
It''s easy to clear up blemishes-that is, when you have ExfoliKate® Acne Clearing Exfoliating Treatment on your side. This unique blend of ingredients intended to target existing blemishes and help prevent new breakouts.
Salicylic Acid aids in clearing up imperfections, without over-drying. Green French Clay and Amazonian Tree Extract are designed to maintain healthy moisture levels. Fruit Enzymes and Jojoba Beads are intended to renew and rejuvenate.

entry.title: Clearing Mask
entry.description:
Target blemishes and help prevent future breakouts with Clearing Mask, infused with Polyphenol-rich Plant Extracts to minimize excess oil production and Phytic Acid to gently slough away dead cells and refine pores. Powerful Antioxidants and calming Botanicals soothe skin and balance pH levels, creating a clearer, brighter, and more radiant-looking complexion.
Multitasking Phytic Acid, a natural exfoliator, is designed to brighten skin tone. Polyphenol-rich Plant Extracts minimize excess oil production. Natural Kaolin Clay assists in absorbing excess sebum and removing impurities. Linseed Extract, rich in essential lipids Omega 3 and Omega 6, helps replenish skin.

entry.title: Quench Hydrating Mask
entry.description:
This incredible complex keeps skin satisfied around the clock by pulling moisture in deep. Quench Hydrating Mask actually locks hydration in, so you’re left with unbelievably smooth, baby soft skin.
Anti-aging Hyaluronic Acid is designed to decrease the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Rare Green Microalgae helps to tone skin and increase the look of firmness. Antioxidant Vitamins E and Pro-Vitamin B help create smoother, more even skin tone and make skin glow. Complex Sugar and Beet-derived Natural Moisturizer delivers intense hydration. Allantoin promotes softer-feeling skin. Cucumber and Canadian Willowherb™ are combined in an effort to soothe and calm irritated or reddened skin.

entry.title: Micro Glycolic Polisher
entry.description:
Peel away the years with a professional formula designed to resurface, rejuvenate, and restore, as well as improve skin radiance, brightness, clarity, and tone. Micro Glycolic Polisher uses a unique solution to minimize the appearance of wrinkles and Gentle Botanicals to promote a healthier-looking complexion overall.
Naturally exfoliates a micro-layer of dull skin cells in order to renew, soften, and smooth skin texture. Glycolic and Lactic Acids diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Glucosamine HCL renews the look of the complexion. Blue Lotus, rich in trace elements, and Bergamot are combined to help soothe and calm skin, while also increasing radiance and brightening skin tone.

entry.title: Clinic-To-Go Resurfacing Peel Pads
entry.description:
In just 28 days, you can completely rejuvenate your appearance. By renewing skin with a twice-weekly treatment, convenient Clinic-To-Go Resurfacing Peel Pads reduce the appearance of fine lines. This powerful treatment regimen resurfaces skin to reveal a more youthful look.
Lactic Acid naturally exfoliates and softens skin, diminishing the appearance of pores and helping brighten skin in just 28 days. Soothing Myrtle and Sage Leaf Extracts calm and condition. 16 individual pads per box.

entry.title: Total Vitamin Antioxidant Face Serum
entry.description:
Find your skin's best serum Total Vitamin™ Antioxidant Face Serum delivers an essential mix of ingredients and feeds the skin antioxidants to protect against free radicals. This incredibly lightweight formula is designed to brighten and balance.
A potent level of Vitamin C and Vitamin E work synergistically to help create a brighter, more even-looking skin tone. Sodium Hyaluranate, which holds 1000 times its weight in water, is formulated to decrease the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Chamomile and Green Tea are combined to uncover healthier-looking skin. A powerful Amino Acid Blend helps to sustain moisturization.

entry.title: Complexion Correction Overnight Discoloration Perfector
entry.description:
Overnight Discoloration Perfector is a high-performance overnight treatment intended to even out the appearance of skin tone and help decrease dark spots. This advanced, multi-pronged solution not only minimizes discoloration, but also reduces the visible signs of aging.
Arbutin and Lumiskin™ are designed to work together to minimize the look of dark spots. Vitamin C and Multifruit® BSC are formulated to soften and smooth. Salicylic Acid helps clarify the complexion.

entry.title: Complexion Correction Daily Discoloration Perfector
entry.description:
Find your skin's best moisturizer This highly effective anti-aging moisturizer dramatically improves skin tone and texture. Based on years of clinical research, Daily Discoloration Perfector brightens the appearance of skin to reveal radiance and create a beautiful glow. This rich, hydrating, multi-tasking formula offers a comprehensive solution that fades the look of discoloration and dark spots, and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Retinol is designed to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Multifruit® BSC, a combination of natural fruit extracts, aids in smoothing skin and improving the look of elasticity and firmness.

entry.title: Complexion Correction Spot Reducing Concentrate
entry.description:
Spot Reducing Concentrate balances skin tone and gradually fades the appearance of discolorations of the skin, such as freckles, age and liver spots, and pigment in the skin that may occur in pregnancy or from the use of oral contraceptives.
Hydroquinone is a proven skin lightener and skin bleaching agent. Time-released Glycolic Acid, an exfoliating agent, works synergistically with Hydroquinone. Allantoin, Panthenol, and a Chamomile derivative are designed to help soothe skin.

entry.title: Anti Bac Clearing Lotion Acne Treatment
entry.description:
Anti Bac™ Acne Clearing Lotion targets pores to help clear existing acne, minimize excess oil production, and eliminate blackheads. Using an ultra-fine delivery system, Benzoyl Peroxide is delivered via a microscopic particle to affected areas, without over-drying. After extensive Clinic testing, this solution has been proven to produce remarkable results.
One of the most popular acne-fighting ingredients available without a prescription, 5% Benzoyl Peroxide, is gently delivered via a microscopic particle. Advanced Liposomes help protect skin from environmental aggressors, alleviate dryness, and prevent excess water loss. REGU®SEB (Argan, Saw Palmetto, and Sesame Seed Extracts) diminishes excess oil production.

entry.title: Clarifying Treatment Toner
entry.description:
This results-oriented solution gives you a fresh beginning, every time. Alcohol-free, oil-free, and fragrance-free, Clarifying Treatment Toner helps to decrease shininess and clarify skin, without stripping or over-drying. Your face and neck will feel refined, refreshed, and renewed.
Multitasking Phytic Acid and Lactic Acid, natural exfoliators, help to brighten skin tone. Witch Hazel, a natural astringent, calms redness. Specially designed NDGA Complex controls excess oil production, clears pores, and creates a healthy balanced environment on the surface of the skin. Aloe and Rich Botanicals soothe skin. Chamomile Extract enhances the effects of hydration.

entry.title: EradiKate Acne Treatment
entry.description:
EradiKate Acne Treatment quickly calms flare-ups and is specially formulated to help prevent future breakouts while reducing the appearance of redness.
Sulphur, an effective acne-fighter, aids in eliminating existing imperfections and keeping new ones from occurring. AHAs are designed to reduce the appearance of enlarged pores. Zinc Oxide, a natural mineral, provides oil control by absorbing excess sebum production.
*Unfortunately, expedited shipping is not available for orders containing EradiKate Acne Treatment. Shipping not available to APO/FPO, Alaska, Hawaii, PR, VI.

entry.title: Line Release Under Eye Repair Cream
entry.description:
In a clinical test*, Line Release™ Under Eye Repair Cream instantly firmed, lifted, and smoothed the appearance of skin. This unbelievably lightweight formula diminishes the appearance of fine lines around the eyes, leaving you rejuvenated and refreshed.
Acetyl Hexapeptide-3 is intended to make the eyes appear lifted and more contoured. Tripeptide reduces the visible depth of expression lines. Matrixyl™ 3000 is formulated to significantly reduce the look of puffiness and dark circles. Light Diffusing Pearls help minimize the look of dark circles and illuminate the entire eye area. Vitamins A, C, and E provide a powerful Antioxidant boost to skin. Soybean protein moisturizes skin. Cucumber Extract conditions and soothes skin.
* Results based on an independent Clinical Study.

entry.title: Complexion Perfection!

Exfoliate and polish skin with ExfoliKate® Intensive Exfoliating Treatment to reveal a glowing, fresh-from-the-Clinic complexion. Scrubbing Microbeads are designed to deep clean pores and Salicylic Acid is formulated to balance hydration, without over-drying. See dramatically smoother, brighter, healthier-looking skin after just 1 use.
Papaya, Pineapple, and Pumpkin Enzymes are formulated to naturally exfoliate dead skin cells, without over-drying. Lactic Acid acts as a natural AHA skin exfoliator. Rosewood and Cinnamon Extracts stimulate micro-circulation. Honey and Vitamin E smooth and soften skin. Aloe Vera helps soothe skin. Vitamin A and C provide Antioxidant benefits. Soy-Lipid replenishes skin’s natural barrier function. 5 oz. luxury size $175 ($37 savings).

entry.title: Detox Daily Cleanser
entry.description:
Washing away makeup, residue, and excess oil with Detox Daily Cleanser is the first step in restoring clarity to acne-prone skin. It also ensures that the products that follow will work most effectively. This rejuvenating formula removes impurities and leaves skin feeling cleaner, brighter, smoother, and softer.
The powerhouse Phytic Acid, a natural exfoliator, is designed to brighten skin tone and fade the appearance of imperfections. Salicylic, Glycolic, and Lactic Acids gently remove dead cells, improving skin texture and revealing younger-looking skin. Vitamin B Complexes prevent over-drying of the skin. Aloe Vera and Allantoin are intended to calm the complexion. Tea Tree and Tangerine Peel Extracts refresh skin. Available in a 16 oz. luxury size for $95 ($33 savings).

entry.title: Gentle Daily Wash
entry.description:
Perfect skin begins with Kate’s delicate gel cleanser, which cleanses and conditions sensitive skin. With efficacious Botanicals, this sulfate-free, gentle formula is formulated to remove makeup and pore-clogging oil, while helping to maintain the skin’s natural moisture barrier. Skin is left feeling hydrated, soft, and refreshed.
Soapbark Tree Extract contains natural saponins, which naturally cleanses skin. Bergamot Oil tones skin and aids in eliminating impurities. Lavender Essence is intended to soothe skin. Natural Sage Oil helps calm and condition. Available in 16 oz. luxury size for $95 ($33 savings).

entry.title: Goat Milk Body Lotion
entry.description:
Prized for its restorative properties, Goat Milk Body Lotion helps improve overall skin health. As a result, this deeply moisturizing formula helps to relieve dryness and leaves skin softer and smoother.
Goat Milk, which has a very close pH to our own skin, provides essential hydration. Calming Aloe conditions skin. Naturally occurring Lactose Enzymes work to gently exfoliate. Available in a 16 oz. luxury size for $80 ($22 savings).

entry.title: Quench Hydrating Face Serum
entry.description:
Find your skin's best serum This advanced complex is designed to pull essential moisture in deep and lock it there. Quench Hydrating Face Serum is formulated to create a gorgeous, dewy complexion that’s silky soft and satiny smooth. Turn back time with a powerful combination of age-defense ingredients.
HSC Complex is designed to deliver intense hydration, while counteracting environmental stressors. An intense form of Vitamin A helps to promote healthier-looking skin and return skin to its youthful appearance by boosting the skin renewal process. Lipids-the key to younger-looking skin-are included to help improve elasticity and firmness. Available in a 2 oz. luxury size for $98 ($32 savings).

entry.title: Quench & Correct Plumping Lip Gloss and Restorative Lip Treatment
entry.description:
Quench & Correct Plumping Gloss and Restorative Lip Treatment performs double duty by moisturizing and replenishing lips. One side, Correct Restorative Lip Treatment, reduces the appearance of lip lines and dryness. The other side, Quench Plumping Gloss, helps restore moisture for an instantly plumped, youthful look that’s bound to keep you beaming. Correct Restorative Lip Treatment
Manuka Honey and Natural Botanicals are designed to boost hydration and smooth out the appearance of lip lines and wrinkles around the lips. Macadamia Nut Extract restores moisture and suppleness to the lips. A natural antioxidant blend of Soybean, Olive, and Jojoba Oils replenishes natural lipids and minimizes the look of feathering.
Quench Plumping Gloss
A potent Lipopeptide Blend helps to firm and create a more youthful-looking pout. An essential Lipid Complex is formulated to rebalance moisture, soften, and condition lips. Creates a glossy shine.

entry.title: Daily Deflector Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 20 Anti-Aging Sunscreen
entry.description:
Find your skin's best moisturizer This lightweight moisturizer does triple duty by providing intense hydration, protecting against environmental damage, and maximizing age-defense effects. The cutting-edge new delivery system in Daily Deflector™ Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 20 Anti-Aging Sunscreen ensures that the sunscreen stays in a reservoir on the surface of the skin-where it is most effective-and the advanced actives penetrate deeply-where they’re able to produce the greatest results. This scientifically advanced complex offers broad-spectrum sun protection, restores optimal moisture levels, and significantly reduces the visible depth and volume of wrinkles. Natural extracts with immediate tightening effects combine with light-diffusing ingredients to create a fresh, healthy-looking complexion.
A revolutionary new “reservoir” system keeps key ingredients separated so that they stay where they work best: sunscreen on the surface and actives underneath. Matrixyl™ 3000 helps reduce the visible depth and volume of wrinkles on the face caused by the contraction of muscles, especially on the forehead area and around the eyes. A naturally derived Shitake Mushroom-based skin tightener has immediate effects on the look of sagging skin and is formulated to gradually strengthen skin’s connective tissue.

entry.title: D-Scar Scar Diminishing Serum
entry.description:
Roll Away Scars* and celebrate smooth skin with Kate’s high-tech rollerball scar diminishing serum, designed to reduce the appearance of scars and uneven texture. A powerful scar-fighting combination, this serum and rollerball applicator are designed to work together to flatten and reduce the look of both new and old scars. With DS-7™, a microencapsulated Peptide essential to the skin renewal process, this formula encourages more normalized, smoother, softer skin.
DS-7, a microencapsulated Peptide, is essential to the skin renewal process. It encourages more normalized, smoother, softer skin. This unique “messenger” Peptide delivers a large amount of essential renewal information to cells. DS-7 is protected within a patented microcapsule that is specially designed to work its way through the tight upper layers of skin to reach the spaces between the cells, in deeper epidermal layers. Once reaching the target site, the message “unlocks” and is able to tell cells when and how to renew properly, resulting in smoother, more even skin texture. Botanical Extract helps even out the appearance of skin texture.
*Reduces the appearance of old and new scars.

entry.title: Age Arrest Anti-Wrinkle Cream
entry.description:
Introducing Age Arrest from Kate Somerville, the first anti-aging treatment with Telo-5™ Technology, based on Nobel Prize* winning research on the youthful benefits of prolonging the life of telomeres. As we age, skin cell telomeres shorten and critical youth information is lost. Over time, this leads to wrinkles, dryness, and sagging skin. Age Arrest’s advanced formula, based on telomere research, is proven to effectively reduce the appearance of wrinkles, increase skin firmness and elasticity, improve the appearance of skin discoloration, and significantly hydrate. Revolutionary Telo-5™ Technology is designed to combat the comprehensive signs of aging and deliver a younger-looking complexion.
Based on the Nobel Prize* winning medical research on telomeres, Telo-5™ Technology is designed to combat the comprehensive signs of aging and deliver a younger-looking complexion Age-defying Peptide, with anti-glycation properties, helps to reduce the degradation of collagen and improve the appearance of firmness. New bio-ferment Extract of Laminaria Kelp works synergistically with skin’s natural Hyaluronic Acid to help diminish the appearance of wrinkles A proprietary blend of Sea Whip Extract and Algae Plasma provides immediate and lasting soothing of sensitive skin
